names.pinyin: ji sheng tu si zi wan jia jian
names.english: modified aid the living cuscuta seed pills
names.commonEnglish: Modified Aid the Living Cuscuta Seed Pills

actions: Tonifies the Kidneys, strengthens Yang, nourishes Yin, astringes Jing and urine and benefits the marrow.
Tonifies the Kidneys and astringes Jing.
Tonifies the Kidneys and strengthens Yang.
With Yi Zhi Ren, for urinary frequency or incontinence.
Warms Ming Men Fire and assists Heart, Kidney and Spleen Yang.
Astringes Jing and urine and stops enuresis.
With Tu Si Zi, for spontaneous emissions.
with Tu Si Zi and Wu Wei Zi, for urinary incontinence, frequent urination and cloudy urination due to Bladder and Kidney Deficiencies.
Tonifies the Kidneys, assists Yang, retains Jing and astringes urine.
With Tu Si Zi, for spermatorrhea and vaginal discharge due to Kidney Deficiency.
Warms the Kidneys and astringes Jing and urine.
With Shan Yao, prevents the development of Heat from Deficiency as a side effect.
Tonifies Kidney Yin and astringes Jing.
Stabilizes Kidneys, astringes urine and retains Jing.
With Sang Piao Xiao, for spermatorrhea, enuresis and incontinence in the elderly due to Kidney Yang Deficiency.

symptoms: Lumbago: low back feels cold, weak and aching
Urinary frequency with abundant, clear urine or
Maybe chronic diarrhea or "cock crow" diarrhea
